page.description: When creating a new layout, you can either copy the design of an existing layout, create one from scratch, or edit the Default Browse or Default Form.

step.description: In the Control Panel, click the tab corresponding to the type of layout you want to create.
Click the New button on the toolbar.
Alpha Anywhere opens a Genie to guide you through creating the new layout.
In the Control Panel, right-click on the layout you want to copy. From the right-click menu, select Duplicate.
Alpha Anywhere prompts you to name the new copy.
Give the layout a name and click OK to save.
Right click the layout in the Control Panel.
